8  void Bus::ReadThread(Bus* pBus)
9  {
10  ROS_INFO("Bus: Read thread started.");
11  pBus->ReadLoop();
12  ROS_INFO("Bus: Read thread terminating.");
13  }
14 
19  double Bus::get_ReadTimeout() const
20  {
21  return 0.001*(double)m_ReadTimeoutMilliseconds;
22  }
23 
25  void Bus::ReadLoop()
26  {
27  struct can_frame frame;
28  while (m_bIsRunning)
29  {
30  {
31  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> guard(m_ReadMutex);
32  if (read(m_Socket, &frame, sizeof(frame)) == sizeof(frame))
33  {
34  std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::time_point timePoint=std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::now();
35  std::unique_lock<std::shared_mutex> guard(m_LastFramesMutex);
36  assert(frame.can_id <= 0x7FF);
37  m_LastFramesById[frame.can_id] = frame;
38  m_LastFrameTimesById[frame.can_id]=timePoint;
39  }
40  }
41  std::this_thread::yield();
42  }
43  }
44 
50  struct can_frame Bus::get_LastFrame(const canid_t id, std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::time_point& receptionTime, bool& bValid)
51  {
52  std::shared_lock<std::shared_mutex> guard(m_LastFramesMutex);
53  assert(id <= 0x7FF);
54  receptionTime=m_LastFrameTimesById[id];
55  bValid=!(m_LastFramesById[id].can_id==0 && m_LastFramesById[id].can_dlc==0);
56  return m_LastFramesById[id];
57  }
58 
62  bool Bus::WriteFrame(const struct can_frame& frame)
63  {
64  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> guard(m_WriteMutex);
65  bool bReturn = write(m_Socket, &frame, sizeof(frame)) == sizeof(frame);
66  std::this_thread::sleep_for (std::chrono::milliseconds(5));
67  return bReturn;
68  }
69 
72  Bus::Bus(const std::string& interfaceName) :
73  m_InterfaceName(interfaceName),
74  m_bIsRunning(true),
75  m_bConnected(false),
76  m_pReadThread(nullptr),
77  m_Socket(-1)
78  {
79  OnStart();
80  }
81 
85  void Bus::Start()
86  {
87  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> guard(m_WriteMutex);
88  OnStart();
89  }
90 
94  void Bus::OnStart()
95  {
96  ROS_INFO("Bus: Starting.");
97  if(!m_bConnected)
98  {
99  m_bIsRunning=true;
100  for(size_t i=0;i<0x800;i++)
101  {
102  m_LastFramesById[i].can_id=0;
103  m_LastFramesById[i].can_dlc=0;
104  m_LastFramesById[i].data[0]=0;
105  m_LastFramesById[i].data[1]=0;
106  m_LastFramesById[i].data[2]=0;
107  m_LastFramesById[i].data[3]=0;
108  m_LastFramesById[i].data[4]=0;
109  m_LastFramesById[i].data[5]=0;
110  m_LastFramesById[i].data[6]=0;
111  m_LastFramesById[i].data[7]=0;
112  m_LastFrameTimesById[i]=std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::now();
113  }
114  Connect();
115  if (m_bConnected)
116  {
117  if (m_pReadThread == nullptr)
118  m_pReadThread = new std::thread(ReadThread, this);
119  }
120  else
121  m_bIsRunning = false;
122  }
123  else
124  ROS_WARN("Bus: A start request was received while already running.");
125  }
126 
130  void Bus::OnStop()
131  {
132  ROS_INFO("Bus: Stopping.");
133  m_bIsRunning = false;
134  if (m_pReadThread != nullptr)
135  {
136  m_pReadThread->join();
137  delete m_pReadThread;
138  m_pReadThread = nullptr;
139  }
140  else
141  ROS_WARN("Bus: A stop request was received while not running.");
142  if (m_bConnected)
143  Disconnect();
144  }
145 
149  void Bus::Stop()
150  {
151  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> guard(m_WriteMutex);
152  OnStop();
153  }
154 
158  Bus::~Bus()
159  {
160  OnStop();
161  }
162 
164  void Bus::Connect()
165  {
166  m_Socket = socket(PF_CAN, SOCK_RAW, CAN_RAW);
167  if (m_Socket == -1)
168  {
169  ROS_ERROR("Bus: Failed to create socket.");
170  return;
171  }
172  struct ifreq ifr;
173  strcpy(ifr.ifr_name, m_InterfaceName.c_str());
174  int errcode = ioctl(m_Socket, SIOCGIFINDEX, &ifr);
175  if (errcode == -1)
176  {
177  ROS_ERROR("Bus: Failed to select the CAN interface.");
178  return;
179  }
180 
181  struct timeval tv;
182  tv.tv_sec = 0;
183  tv.tv_usec = m_ReadTimeoutMilliseconds * 1000;
184  errcode = setsockopt(m_Socket, SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVTIMEO, (const char*)& tv, sizeof tv);
185  if (errcode == -1)
186  {
187  ROS_ERROR("Bus: Failed to set the read timout.");
188  return;
189  }
190 
191  struct sockaddr_can addr;
192  addr.can_family = AF_CAN;
193  addr.can_ifindex = ifr.ifr_ifindex;
194  errcode = bind(m_Socket, (struct sockaddr*) & addr, sizeof(addr));
195  if (errcode == -1)
196  {
197  ROS_ERROR("Bus: Failed to bind to the socket.");
198  return;
199  }
200  ROS_INFO("Bus: Succesfully connected to CAN-Bus.");
201  m_bConnected = true;
202  }
203 
205  void Bus::Disconnect()
206  {
207  if (m_Socket == -1)
208  {
209  ROS_ERROR("Bus: Attempting to disconnect non-existent socket.");
210  return;
211  }
212  int errcode = close(m_Socket);
213  if (errcode == -1)
214  {
215  ROS_ERROR("Bus: Failed to close socket.");
216  }
217  else
218  {
219  ROS_INFO("Bus: Succesfully disconnected from CAN-Bus.");
220  }
221  m_Socket = -1;
222  m_bConnected = false;
223  }
224 
227  const std::string& Bus::get_InterfaceName() const
228  {
229  return m_InterfaceName;
230  }
231 
234  bool Bus::get_IsConnected() const
235  {
236  return m_bConnected;
237  }
